import React from "react"; import '../css/Popup.css' export function Popup({ isOpen, onClose, items }) { if (!isOpen) return null; console.log(items); return (
e.stopPropagation()}>
Event Details
{items.length > 0 ? ( items.map((item) => (

{item.eventName}

Type: {item.eventType}

Date: {new Date(item.eventDate).toLocaleDateString()}

Go to Event
)) ) : (

No events available

)}
); }
